data.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales Digital Extras
data.detailed_description:
Digital Extras Includes:
Making Of Booklet
Making Of A Character Video
Soundtrack (all mp3):
  • Overture
  • The Artefact of Destiny
  • Wilbur's Theme
  • Ivo's Action Theme
  • The Evil
  • Undeads
  • Orcs
  • Mage Tower
  • Seastone
  • Song of Death
  • Mummy
  • Main Title
  • Sunken Temple
  • The Hall of the Mountain Dwarfs
  • Trailer
  • Love_Theme
  • Eerie Background
  • Seastone Sad
  • Shaman
  • Escape
  • Cannon Launch
  • The Book of Unwritten Tales Suite
    Note: Digital Extras will be located at Program files -> Steam -> Steamapps -> Common -> The Book of Unwritten Tales -> Digital Extras
